    public class FilesConfig
extends Object
implements FilesConfigMBean
    Note: this class changed name from SitemapConfig, as it can be used now for other files as well.
    Author:
    joseph

      • setBaseDirectory

        public void setBaseDirectory(String baseDirectory)
        Description copied from interface: FilesConfigMBean
        Sets the path to the base directory for any files served by the FileProxyServlet. Note that this is not a URL (i.e. no 'file:' protocol) but just a path in the file system.
        Specified by:
        setBaseDirectory in interface FilesConfigMBean
